text: "Voices in the Sky" is a 1968 song by English progressive rock band The Moody Blues. It was taken from their third studio album In Search of the Lost Chord and was one of the two singles released from the album along with Ride My See- Saw. It went to number 27 in the United Kingdom. ==References== Category:1968 songs Category:The Moody Blues songs Category:Progressive rock songs
title: Voices in the Sky
